item.description:
Merry Christmas,

for any of you, who will be alone on Christmas, my friends are putting on a dinner buffet at the Knights of Columbus in Salem, NH from 12:30-3:30pm.  they have food for 150 people and last year I went, and the food was great!  There is no cost, but I would recommend getting there early.

I will be there at 12:15, knowing my dad, as seating is limited, but it does go on for 3 hours, and they experience different shifts at different times.

The K of C is located at 37 Main Street (exit 2 off route 93) Salem, NH.

Merry Christmas to all of you, and many more are wished for you and yours' ;)

hugs,

susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there at 12:15 with my family...

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Free Christmas Dinner Buffet...
